Package ex.train

Interface Summary
AbstractPhrase Represents phrase consisting of abstract tokens and additional information accessible using getData().
AbstractToken  
DataSample DataSample represents a single sample suitable for input to machine learning classifiers.
DataSource Converts a document to some representation suitable for input to machine learning algorithms.
DataSource.FeatureIterator  
PhraseBook<INTERNAL,EXTERNAL>  
PhraseBookReader  
PhraseBookWriter  
SampleClassification Contains information about the classified class and classification confidence.
SampleClassifier An interface to be implemented by external classifiers in order to be integrated into ex.
SampleIterator Iterates over document's samples.
Vocab  
 

Class Summary
Attribute Attribute of a training Instance
CountPhraseBookAdapter Adapter class for NgramBooks to accumulate ngram occurrence counts.
DataSourceWriter Dumps the whole contents of a DataSource to file.
FeatCand  
FIntList Light-weight serializable forward-only linked list
GenericPhrase General-purpose simple array-based implementation of AbstractPhrase.
HashVocabImpl  
Instance Instance as found in training data
KB  
NBestResult  
NgramBook<INTERNAL,EXTERNAL>  
NgramBookLL  
NgramFeatureBook  
NgramFeatureGen Induces a set of features potentially useful for phrase extraction from an input ngram book and a set of input arguments.
NgramInfo Holds statistics about a particular ngram of tokens.
NgramMatcher  
NgramProc Ngram processor contains algorithms to perform transformations within a given ngram book.
PhraseBookImpl  
PhraseBookReaderImpl  
PhraseBookWriterImpl A generic (slow) phrase book writer to write any type of phrase book.
PhraseInfo PhraseInfo as stored in PhraseBook
PhraseSource Generates phrases suitable for input to machine learning classifiers.
PhraseTrie A PhraseTrie extends the get capabilities of IntTrie.
PrecEstimator Tool to estimate P(attribute|phrase_i) for all phrases from supplied dictionary by searching corpus for occurences of each phrase.
SampleSetFactory Utility class that creates empty datasets with features set according to the specified DataSource implementation.
TokenInfo TokenInfo as stored in Vocab
Trainer Reads training objects from DB and documents they are referenced from.
VocabImpl Vocab stores words, their ids, and ids of their lemmas (which are other words in this or another Dict).
WordSource
